detaileddescription.para:
-imagesFind image files with magic expansion and convert them for use with stratagus. *-rgb.png: convert from RGB to stratagus palette *-big.png: shrink to half size, then convert from RGB as above TODO *.xcf: assumed to be the source of the same .png, print warning if newer
Planned: What about something like this? Would this help? *-playercolor.png, *-unit.png: first is converted to gray, then puzzled together with the right palette entries
